$AMD $AAPL $MSFT $NVDA $GOOGL AMZN etc...  Don't overthink it. Make a list of the BEST in class profitable companies and average in or wait for a reversal. Don't need to catch THE bottom.

links.description: A 35-year-old man returned to the U.S. from Wuhan, China on Jan. 15, 2020 and fell ill with a cough and fever. The truth is
Verb spent the last year signing 70 big enterprise mlm clients for their verblive platform bc mlm's have the largest salesforces. Verb needs scale to make big money, as the price for crm is only  5/10 bucks a month per employee. Now, Verb has 100's of 1000's of mlm distributors using verb live doing this

https://youtu.be/lpvFxCdvSjk

Verb released what u can expect from the final product
https://youtu.be/c5xKOK6VhZg

Verb got David Meltzer to be their producer to supply streaming content for Verb to make shoppable.
Meltzer recently signed a deal w/$AAPL 

 i think we see some new sports teams, & a few events over the next couple  weeks. 
Once its evident that Verb is launching their ecommerce site its just so undervalued here it will click up so fast.
